wikipedia_page.main: Richard Merritt (22 July 1897 – 1978), known as Dick or Dicky Merritt, was an English footballer who scored 16 goals from 97 appearances in the Football League playing as an outside left for South Shields, Durham City, Lincoln City and Notts County. He played in the Midland League for York City, and also played non-league football for Easington Colliery Welfare and Washington Colliery.
